description: This file defines an Angular component named FeedComponent, which handles displaying a feed and emitting events when a question is opened. It uses Angular core modules, common modules like NgFor and NgIf, and a service called QuestionDataService to fetch or refresh data based on input changes.

classes.name: FeedComponent
classes.description: An Angular component responsible for displaying a feed and handling user interactions to open questions. It refreshes data when input query changes and emits events when a question is opened.

methods.name: ngOnChanges
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that triggers when input properties change. It refreshes data in the QuestionDataService if the 'query' input changes.

parameters.name: changes
parameters.description: An object that holds current and previous values of changed input properties.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Emits an event with the question id to notify parent components that a question should be opened.
